General.Name: FansUnite Entertainment Inc
General.Description: FansUnite Entertainment Inc. operates as a sports and entertainment company. It focuses on technology related to regulated and lawful online sports betting, esports betting, casino, and other related products. The company also offers Chameleon Gaming Platform, a full suite sports betting and casino platform, which includes products for pre-match betting, in-play betting, horse-racing, daily fantasy, content, and a suite of certified casino style chance games; MCbookie sportsbook offers in various markets for Scottish leagues, Scottish horse racing, and local sports; and Props.com, which focuses on tools, news, and resources that are related to prop bets. In addition, it provides affiliate marketing services through Betting Hero brand. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2
